data.name: 64.0 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The 64.0 Soundtrack is a collection of 6 different songs from 3 awesome artists.

Songs:


  • 'Weiß Schwarz' - Terrell Chavis
  • 'Cover Trance' - djchacha
  • 'The Game Corner' - Conor Busse
  • 'Hide & Seek' - Conor Busse
  • 'The Funk Tank' - Conor Busse
  • 'Lucky Coin' - Conor Busse
data.about_the_game:
The 64.0 Soundtrack is a collection of 6 different songs from 3 awesome artists.

Songs:

data.short_description: This DLC contain's the awesome music from 64.0.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / W7 / W8 / W10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / W7 / W8 / W10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
